title: How to Open a Draw Io File in 3 Easy Steps

steps.title: Go to https://www.drawio.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.drawio.com in a web browser. You can use any web browser to open an existing file. Log in if prompted. If you don't have an account, you'll need to sign up for one and may qualify for a free 30-day trial of the software.

steps.title: Click Open Existing Diagram.
steps.content: Click Open Existing Diagram . It's the bottom option in the menu and will open your file manager. [1] X Research source If your draw.io file is in Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, GitHub, etc, you can click Not Device? to sign into these cloud drives.

steps.title: Find and double-click the file.
steps.content: Find and double-click the file. It'll open in your web browser. [2] X Research source If you are already in a project in draw.io, click File > Open from and select the location of your file.
